title: Now Open: Northeast Pizza
content: 2203 Lexington Ave., Kansas City, Missouri is now home to Northeast Pizza. The New York-style pizza joint is owned and operated by Max Popoff (Farewell Cafe), Noah Quillec (French Market), and Michael DeStefano (Verbena). Read about the origins of the shop here in a new KCUR/Startland article and click here to check out the menu, order online, and follow the shop on social media!
